file_content.text: Listen up! There's an Imperial fleet in orbit, and the planetary cannon facility below is the key to defeating the enemy.
Unfortunately, the facility's main cannon is still charging.
Now until it's ready to fire, you need to use the turret and gun battery emplacements to hold back the Imperials attempting to land.
We've lured the Republic fleet into position. The planetary cannon facility below can destroy the enemy in one stroke.
But the facility's main cannon is still powering up.
Until it's ready, we must use the turret and gun battery emplacements to drive off the Republic reinforcements.
Turret locked on Imperial ship. Now firing.
They're firing on us! Take that turret!
We're taking turret fire! Need ground support!
Turret secure and target locked. Firing now.
Gun battery firing. Good work.
Registering power buildup. They've got the gun battery!
Enemy has captured the gun battery!
The gun battery is under our command.
Emitter is working. Shield enhancements operational.
Republic shields are enhanced. They have the emitter!
Enemy shields enhanced!
Emitter is working. Shield enhancements online.
Shields holding, but we're taking damage!
Enemy taking fire.
Shields failing! We need to recapture those weapons!
Republic vessel in critical condition. Continue firing!
Imperial vessel is taking damage!
Sustaining heavy damage!
Severe damage to enemy ship! Keep that firepower coming!
We're losing our shields! Take control of the enemy weapons!
Shields down! Get this ship out of here! Ground forces retreat!
The Republic ship has fled. The planet's defenses belong to us.
Reports coming in... enemy flagship retreating! Well done, all of you.
Shields down, weapons nonfunctional... all forces, retreat. Retreat!
Fighters coming in! Losing power to shields... we need to finish this!
Republic fighter squadron engaged. Taking moderate damage.
May the Force be with you. All units, go, go!
Victory for the Empire! All forces, deploy!
Unfortunately the Imps are on to us. They've sent a dropship and a full ground team to stop us.
The facility below has three air-defense artillery turrets. Find each turret's targeting console and slice in to take control of it.
Turn that firepower on the enemy dropship and bring it down!
Unfortunately, it seems the Republic anticipated this move. They've sent a dropship and a full ground team to oppose us.
There are three air-defense artillery turrets on the ground. Find and slice the targeting console for each turret to take control of it.
Turn those turrets against the Republic dropship and we've got them. Destroy that ship!
The deployment vehicles are ready. Get on them.
The deployment vehicles are ready. Use them.
Artillery is under our control.
Artillery has locked on us!
Artillery is under our control.
Artillery has locked on us!
Shields down! Full retreat! Engines are not responding to...
The Republic ship has been eliminated. The planet's defenses are ours.
We've lost shields! Engines unresponsive! Retreat! I repeat...
Reports coming in...enemy ship destroyed! Well done, all of you.
